info.headline: Hard Freeze Watch issued January 01 at 2:35PM CST until January 03 at 9:00AM CST by NWS Houston - Galveston
info.description: ...FREEZE WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 3 AM TO 9 AM CST SUNDAY... ...HARD FREEZE WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM LATE SUNDAY NIGHT THROUGH MONDAY MORNING... * WHAT...For the Freeze Warning, sub-freezing temperatures as low as 26 degrees are expected. For the Hard Freeze Watch, sub- freezing temperatures as low as 22 degrees are possible. * WHERE...Houston, Trinity, Madison, Walker, Burleson, Brazos and Grimes Counties. * WHEN...For the Freeze Warning, from 3 AM to 9 AM CST Sunday. For the Hard Freeze Watch, from late Sunday night through Monday morning. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions could kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.
